title: `cargo test -p bevy_ecs` fails

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Implementation
labels.description: This issue is ready for an implementation PR. Go for it!

labels.name: D-Straightforward
labels.description: Simple bug fixes and API improvements, docs, test and examples

body:
## Bevy version

main

b129764924431ab0a09f0cbcd2860e37695cd120 tested
4e694ae first failing commit

## Relevant system information

rustc 1.87.0 (17067e9ac 2025-05-09)

SystemInfo { os: "macOS 15.3.2 Sequoia", kernel: "24.3.0", cpu: "Apple M4 Max", core_count: "16", memory: "64.0 GiB" }
AdapterInfo { name: "Apple M4 Max", vendor: 0, device: 0, device_type: IntegratedGpu, driver: "", driver_info: "", backend: Metal }

## What you did

`cargo test -p bevy-ecs`

## What went wrong
```
error[E0599]: no method named `as_string` found for struct `DebugName` in the current scope
  --> crates/bevy_ecs/src/system/system_name.rs:98:25
   |
98 |             name.name().as_string()
   |                         ^^^^^^^^^
   |
help: there is a method `to_string` with a similar name
   |
98 -             name.name().as_string()
98 +             name.name().to_string()
   |

error[E0599]: no method named `as_string` found for struct `DebugName` in the current scope
   --> crates/bevy_ecs/src/system/system_name.rs:110:25
    |
110 |             name.name().as_string()
    |                         ^^^^^^^^^
    |
help: there is a method `to_string` with a similar name
    |
110 -             name.name().as_string()
110 +             name.name().to_string()
    |

error[E0599]: no method named `as_string` found for struct `DebugName` in the current scope
   --> crates/bevy_ecs/src/system/system_name.rs:124:59
    |
124 |         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().as_string();
    |                                                           ^^^^^^^^^
    |
help: there is a method `to_string` with a similar name
    |
124 -         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().as_string();
124 +         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().to_string();
    |

error[E0599]: no method named `as_string` found for struct `DebugName` in the current scope
   --> crates/bevy_ecs/src/system/system_name.rs:134:59
    |
134 |         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().as_string();
    |                                                           ^^^^^^^^^
    |
help: there is a method `to_string` with a similar name
    |
134 -         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().as_string();
134 +         let name = world.run_system_once(system).unwrap().to_string();
    |

Some errors have detailed explanations: E0599, E0602.
For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0599`.
warning: `bevy_ecs` (lib test) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
error: could not compile `bevy_ecs` (lib test) due to 4 previous errors; 1 warning emitted

```

## Additional information

`cargo run -p ci test` works fine.
`cargo test -p bevy_ecs --features=bevy_utils/debug` works fine.
